name: Loblaw Pharmacy
address: Loblaw Pharmacy, 8195 120 St, Delta, BC V4C 6P7

featured_reviews.review_id:
My Mum had an incredibly disappointing experience at Loblaw Pharmacy when she went to pick up her medication. Unfortunately, it was marred by the behavior of the male pharmacist on duty, who was not only rude but also condescending. This kind of treatment is unacceptable, especially in a place that is supposed to provide care and support to customers.

My Mum, who is already dealing with health issues, should not have had to endure such disrespectful behavior from a professional who is meant to be compassionate and understanding. It left her feeling uncomfortable and hesitant to return to the pharmacy in the future.

Pharmacies should be safe spaces where people can trust the advice and assistance of the professionals working there. However, this experience at Loblaw Pharmacy shattered that sense of security and reliability. It is disheartening to see that a place that is supposed to cater to the health needs of the community fails to meet even the basic standards of customer service and respect.

I hope that this review serves as a wakeup call for Loblaw Pharmacy management to address the issue promptly. It is crucial for them to reevaluate their staff's behavior and ensure that such incidents do not happen again. No customer, especially someone seeking medical help, should be made to feel uncomfortable or unwelcome.

Given the negative experience my Mum had, I cannot recommend Loblaw Pharmacy to anyone until they address and rectify the situation. It is essential for any business to prioritize customer care, and in this regard, Loblaw Pharmacy has fallen short. As a result, I strongly advise seeking an alternative pharmacy where you can feel confident that you will be treated with respect and kindness during your visits.

featured_reviews.review_id: The people are helpful but they literally never pickup the phone and the automated directory is so quiet you can barely hear it, even when you call on speaker. It's really frustrating and if I didn't literally have to go here, I would avoid it entirely. The hold music is good though.
featured_reviews.review_text: The people are helpful but they literally never pickup the phone and the automated directory is so quiet you can barely hear it, even when you call on speaker. It's really frustrating and if I didn't literally have to go here, I would avoid it entirely. The hold music is good though.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Amaizng team working out there. Helped me out last minute, even though they had their hands full.
Very pleasant service, have been using loblaw pharmacy for over 30 years. Have the best you guys amen.

featured_reviews.review_id: They dont do their due diligence with regards to benefit coverage. I highly recommend you go to a small personal pharmacy.
featured_reviews.review_text: They dont do their due diligence with regards to benefit coverage. I highly recommend you go to a small personal pharmacy.

featured_reviews.review_id: Wow. Yep, the majority of these reviews are correct. If you need antibiotics to save your life, forget it, go somewhere else. Doctor faxed in the morning, thought I'd give ample time and 6 hours later, told to wait 45 minutes. Really? no star!!

featured_reviews.review_id: Complete garbage, no one picks up the phone, no point in sending a fax no one will get to it. The best part is that they don't care. Save your time and go somewhere else.
featured_reviews.review_text: Complete garbage, no one picks up the phone, no point in sending a fax no one will get to it. The best part is that they don't care. Save your time and go somewhere else.

featured_reviews.review_id: Terrible service. This is the second time they screwed up!!! My husband gave them insurance card to cover the cost for medication. The old lady apparently kept it in-front of her her but still charged for the full price. I will be changing the pharmacy for sure going forward as they will not change their ways. All bunch of east Indian ladies who do not know proper english are working there and have no idea on how to talk to people. Please stay home if you don't want to work properly!!!

All bunch of east Indian ladies who do not know proper english are working there and have no idea on how to talk to people. Please stay home if you don't want to work properly!!!

featured_reviews.review_id: Came twice under a week to get my prescription...first time they say we dnt fill fixed prescriptions unless u call and request ...came back 4 days later and they say ohh give us 15mins..after I asked why she says not filled I said you had 4 days to fill it...then the one lady goes ohh if u dnt pick up withing a week we put it back all lies..make me wait again 15mins  and its still not ready..you stand in line waiting no one comes and helps you..worst Customer service!
